SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Camp
This is the camp entity file that contains information about a camp, including details, participants, camp committee members, withdrawn students, and suggestions
CampCommittee
The class represents a student who is part of the camp committee, inheriting basic student attributes.
CampCommitteeEnquiryMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Camp Committee to manage enquiries Implements the MainMenuInterface for standardized menu structures
CampCommitteeEnquiryManager
The CampCommitteeEnquiryManager class provides functionality for Camp Committee members to manage enquiries in the NTU CAMS System It includes methods for creating, adding, deleting, and editing enquiries, as well as viewing and replying to enquiries for a specific camp committee member
CampCommitteeEnquiryNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page for Camp Committee to manage enquiries This class extend NavigationPage class and is sepcific to the Camp Committee user role
CampCommitteeMainMenu
Represents the main menu for the Camp Committee members Provides options to view camps, register for a camp, access enquiry and suggestion pages, view registered camps, attendee lists, and generate reports additionally, includes options to withdraw from a camp, change the password, logout and quit the program
CampCommitteeManager
The CampCommitteeManager class manages the coversion of a Student to a CampCommittee member Provides a method to create a CampCommittee member based on a given Student and perform necessary updates
CampCommitteeNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page for Camp Committee users This class extends NavigationPage class and provide menu options for Camp Committee to interact with the system
CampCommitteeRepository
Represents a repository for storing and managing camp committee records This class provides methods to retrieve, add, and query camp committee information stored in the repository
CampCommitteeSuggestionMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Camp Committee Suggestion Implements the MainMenuInterface for standardized menu structures
CampCommitteeSuggestionNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page for Camp Committee to manage suggestions This class extend NavigationPage class and is sepcific to the Camp Committee user role
CampDetails
This class contains the details of a camp, including its name, dates, user group, location, available slots, camp committee slots, description, staff in charge, and visibility status
CampManager
This class provides functionality to manage camps in the NTU CAMS System It includes methods for adding and removing suggestions, printing camp details, checking if camp is created by a specific staff, and printing camp information for both staff and students
CampReport
The CampReport class generates a report for a specific camp with detailed information about its participants, committee members, and camp details CampReport extends Report so as to perform polymorphism and override funcitons, while using function in Report
CampRepository
Represent a repository for storing and managing camps This class provides methods to retrieve, add, remove and query camps stored in the repository
ChangeAccountPassword
The ChangeAccountPassword class provides functionality to change the password for the currently logged-in user
Display
This class provides methods for printing messages and performing console-related actions These methods are used for user interaction and system feedback in the NTU CAMS System
Enquiry
This class represents an enquiry made by a user towards a certain camp
Enquiry.EnquiryStatus
Status of the Enquiry
EnquiryManager
This class manages users interaction and operations related to enquiries It provides methods for creating, adding, deleting, editing, and viewing enquiries, along with handling the associated user input and file operations
EnquiryReport
The EnquiryReport class generates a report detailing enquiries associated with a specific camp Total number of enquiries will be shown, and details regarding each enquiry will be shown.
EnquiryRepository
Represents a repository for storing and managing enquiries This class provides method to retrive, add and query enquiries stored in the repository
FileCheck
The FileCheck class provides method to check if essential CSV files exist in the application It includes file paths for student, staff, camp commmittee, suggestion, enquiry, camp details and camp student list CSV files The main purpose of this class is to determine whether these files exist, which is crucial for proper functioning when reading or writing data to and from these files
FileRead
The FileRead class provides methods for reading data from CSV files into the application It supports reading user-related data (CampCommittee, Student, Staff), camp details camp student lists, suggestions and enquiries from their respective CSV files The class includes a method to conditionally reset the data by reading from default CSV files when specified by the user
FileWriting
The FileWriting class provides methods to write data to various CSV files related to the application Includes methods for writing user-related data (CampCommittee, Student and Staff), suggestions, camp details and camp student lists to their respective CSV files
Filter
Utility class for filtering camps based on various criteria.
FormatDate
Utility class for formatting dates.
InputScanner
Utility class for handling user input.
LoginManager
Manages login process for users in the system This class handles user authentication, password checks, and first-time login procedures
MainMenuInterface
The MainMenuInterface provides a standard interface for displaying main menus in the NTU CAMS System Classes implementing this interface are expected to provide a method to display the main menu
NavigationPage
The NavigationPage class represents a generic navigation page in the NTU CAMS System It serves as a base class for specific navigation pages and ensures a standardized structure Subclasses must implement the 'run' method to define the behavior of the navigation page
PerformanceReport
The PerformanceReport class generates a report for a specific camp with information about its committee members and their corresponding points.
ReadCampDetails
Utility class for reading and parsing camp details from a csv file Provides methods to read camp details
ReadCampStudentList
Utility class for reading and parsing student camp details from a csv file Provides methods to read camp details
ReadEnquiry
Utility class for reading and parsing enquiries from a CSV File Provides methods to read enquiries without resetting or with resetting the file content
ReadSuggestion
The ReadSuggestion class provides methods for reading and processing suggestions from a CSV file Includes methods to read suggestions from the CSV file with or without reset and update the internal repositories accordingly
ReadUser
The ReadUser class provides methods to read user information from CSV files, initialise repositories, and reset user data if necessary.
Report
This is the superclass of the current CampReport, EnquiryReport, and PerformanceReport report contains content and text file can be generated
ReportManager
This class manages the generation and filtering of reports for camps.
Reset
The class responsible for prompting the user for data reset options It provides a method to display reset option menu and receive user input for choosing whether to reset data or use previous data
Sort
Utility class for sorting camps.
Staff
This class represents a staff member in the system, inheriting basic user attributes
StaffEnquiryMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Staff Enquiries This class implements the MainMenuInterface for standardized menu structures and provides options for staff members to view and reply to enquiries directed to them on their respective camps
StaffEnquiryManager
This class manages Staff-specific interations and operations related to enquiries Provides methods for staff to view all enquiries, reply to pending enquiries, and retrieve enquiries based on selected indices
StaffEnquiryNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page Staff to manage enquiries This class extend NavigationPage class and is sepcific to the Staff user role
StaffMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Staff members This class provides options to view, create, edit, delete camps, access enquiry and suggestion pages, view registered camps, attendee lists, and generate reports Additionally, includes options to withdraw from a camp, change the password, log out, and quit the program This class implements the MainMenuInterface to ensure consistency in menu display across different user roles
StaffManager
The StaffManager class provides methods to allow Staff to manage camp such as viewing camps, editing camps, viewing suggestions and handling enquiries
StaffNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page for Staff users This class extends NavigationPage class and provide menu options for Staff to interact with the system
StaffRepository
Represents a repository for storing and managing staff records This class provides methods to retrieve, add and query staff information stored in the repository
StaffSuggestionMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Staff Suggestion This class implements the MainMenuInterface for standardized menu structures and provides options for staff members to view and reply to suggestions directed to them on their respective camps
StaffSuggestionManager
This class provides functionalities specifically for staffs to manage suggestion related to the camps they have created.
StaffSuggestionNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page for Staff to manage suggestions This class extend NavigationPage class and is sepcific to Staff user role
Start
The main class responsible for starting the program It initializes necessary components, handles user login and redirects users based on their roles to the appropriate navigation pages
Student
This class represents a student in the system, inheriting basic user attributes
StudentEnquiryMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Student Enquiries This class implements the MainMenuInterface for standardized menu structures and provides options for students to view, create, edit and delete enquiries
StudentEnquiryNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page for Student to manage enquiries This class extend NavigationPage class and is sepcific to the Student user role
StudentMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Student This class provides options to view list of available camps, register for camps, navigate to enquiry page, view registered camps Additionally, includes options to withdraw from a camp, change the password, log out, and quit the program This class implements the MainMenuInterface to ensure consistency in menu display across different user roles
StudentManager
The StudentManager class provides methods to allow Student to perform actions related to camp such as registering for camps, withdrawing from camps and viewing available camps based on filter
StudentNavigationPage
Represents a navigation page for Student users This class extends NavigationPage class and provide menu options for Student to interact with the system
StudentRepository
Represents a repository for storing and managing student records This class provides methods to retrieve, add, remove and query student information stored in the repository
Suggestion
This class represents a suggestion made by a camp committee member
Suggestion.SuggestionStatus
Enumerated type representing the status of the suggestion
SuggestionManager
This class provides functionalities related to suggestions, allowing Camp Committee members to add, edit, delete and view suggestions
SuggestionRepository
Represent a repository for storing suggestions This class provides methods to retrieve the list of suggestions and add a new suggestion to the repository
User
This class represents a generic user in the system with basic attributes
WriteCampDetails
Utility class for writing camp details to a csv file Provides a method to write camp details to the file
WriteCampStudentList
Utility class for writing Student camp details to a csv file Provides a method to write Student camp details to the file
WriteEnquiry
Utility class for reading and writing enquires to a CSV file Provides methods for writing, deleting, updating, and replying to enquiries in the CSV file
WriteSuggestion
The WriteSuggestion class provides a method to write suggestions to a CSV file Suggestions are retrieved from the SuggestionRepository and formatted into a CSV format which is then written to the specific file path
WriteUser
The WriteUser class provides methods to write user data (Staff, Student, CampCommittee) to respective CSV files It also includes methods to update the CSV files with the current list of users in their respective repositories
